snippet.title: Scream 7 - Official Big Game Spot (2026) Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox, Isabel May
snippet.description:
Don't miss the Big Game Spot for Scream 7, the upcoming horror film starring Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox, Isabel May, Jasmin Savoy Brown, Mason Gooding, Anna Camp, Joel McHale, Mckenna Grace, Michelle Randolph, Jimmy Tatro, Asa Germann, Celeste O’Connor, Sam Rechner, Ethan Embry, Tim Simons and Mark Consuelos.

When a new Ghostface killer emerges in the quiet town where Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) has built a new life, her darkest fears are realized as her daughter (Isabel May) becomes the next target. Determined to protect her family, Sidney must face the horrors of her past to put an end to the bloodshed once and for all.

Scream 7 is produced by William Sherak, James Vanderbilt, and Paul Neinstein. Based on characters created by Kevin Williamson. The story is by James Vanderbilt & Guy Busick. The screenplay is by Kevin Williamson and Guy Busick.

Scream 7, directed by Kevin Williamson, opens in theaters on February 27.

#Scream7 #Movies #IGN
